name: Attack on Titan The Game
description:
Experience Action-Packed Fighting with Attack on Titan Heroes and Villains


Who’s in your Survey Crops? Join your favorite Attack on Titan Heroes & Villains in the best fighting game on PC. Assemble a team of heroes like Levi Ackerman, Mikasa Ackerman & Connie Springer to combat the forces against you. Master new skills and crush opponents in dynamic battles. Upgrade your Heroes with powerful stats as you fight your way through the game. Become a champion by collecting XP for your characters and dominating your foes in battle. Every battle will define you—join the fight and become the ultimate Attack on Titan champion!

ACTION PACKED COMBAT

• Look out for more characters to come like Zeke Yeager, Reiner Braun, Annie Leonhart, and much more
• Unleash epic attacks on your opponents with Sasha Blouse, Hannes and much more
• Take your battles to the next level—inflict massive damage and decimate Titans
• Earn XP from slaying Titans to customize your roster with powerful upgrades
• Team up with friends and share your Titan-slaying achievements online
• Be social—share with friends, connect to Facebook, and more!

CONSOLE QUALITY EXPERIENCE

• Experience the best graphics on PC—play with Levi, Mikasa and many more in high definition
• Become the champion the world needs—enter an endless war of Scouts vs Titans


Join now today and unite YOUR Survey Corps!
